doubleTapAsButtonPress.description: Treat double tap as button press
doubleTapAsButtonPress.label: Double Tap as Button Press

nodeInfoBroadcastInterval.description: How often to broadcast node info
nodeInfoBroadcastInterval.label: Интервал вещания передачи информации об узле

posixTimezone.description: The POSIX timezone string for the device
posixTimezone.label: Часовой пояс POSIX

role.description: What role the device performs on the mesh
role.label: Роль

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth Settings
bluetooth.note: Note: Some devices (ESP32) cannot use both Bluetooth and WiFi at the same time.

carouselDelay.description: How fast to cycle through windows
carouselDelay.label: Carousel Delay

compassNorthTop.description: Fix north to the top of compass
compassNorthTop.label: Compass North Top

oledType.description: Type of OLED screen attached to the device
oledType.label: OLED Type

screenTimeout.description: Turn off the display after this long
screenTimeout.label: Screen Timeout

wakeOnTapOrMotion.description: Wake the device on tap or motion
wakeOnTapOrMotion.label: Wake on Tap or Motion

codingRate.description: The denominator of the coding rate
codingRate.label: Частота кодирования

frequencyOffset.description: Frequency offset to correct for crystal calibration errors
frequencyOffset.label: Frequency Offset

ignoreMqtt.description: Don't forward MQTT messages over the mesh
ignoreMqtt.label: Игнорировать MQTT

okToMqtt.description: When set to true, this configuration indicates that the user approves the packet to be uploaded to MQTT. If set to false, remote nodes are requested not to forward packets to MQTT
okToMqtt.label: ОК в MQTT

region.description: Sets the region for your node
region.label: Регион / Страна

spreadingFactor.description: Indicates the number of chirps per symbol
spreadingFactor.label: Spreading Factor

transmitEnabled.description: Enable/Disable transmit (TX) from the LoRa radio
transmitEnabled.label: Передача включена

usePreset.description: Use one of the predefined modem presets
usePreset.label: Использовать шаблон

network.title: WiFi Config
network.note: Note: Some devices (ESP32) cannot use both Bluetooth and WiFi at the same time.

ethernetEnabled.description: Enable or disable the Ethernet port
ethernetEnabled.label: Включено

wifiEnabled.description: Enable or disable the WiFi radio
wifiEnabled.label: Включено

broadcastInterval.description: How often your position is sent out over the mesh
broadcastInterval.label: Период трансляции

fixedPosition.description: Don't report GPS position, but a manually-specified one
fixedPosition.label: Фиксированное положение

gpsMode.description: Configure whether device GPS is Enabled, Disabled, or Not Present
gpsMode.label: GPS Mode

gpsUpdateInterval.description: How often a GPS fix should be acquired
gpsUpdateInterval.label: GPS Update Interval

positionFlags.description: Optional fields to include when assembling position messages. The more fields are selected, the larger the message will be leading to longer airtime usage and a higher risk of packet loss.
positionFlags.label: Флаги позиции

smartPositionEnabled.description: Only send position when there has been a meaningful change in location
smartPositionEnabled.label: Enable Smart Position

smartPositionMinDistance.description: Minimum distance (in meters) that must be traveled before a position update is sent
smartPositionMinDistance.label: Smart Position Minimum Distance

smartPositionMinInterval.description: Minimum interval (in seconds) that must pass before a position update is sent
smartPositionMinInterval.label: Smart Position Minimum Interval

intervalsSettings.description: How often to send position updates
intervalsSettings.label: Intervals

flags.dop: Dilution of precision (DOP) PDOP used by default
flags.hdopVdop: If DOP is set, use HDOP / VDOP values instead of PDOP

adcMultiplierOverride.description: Used for tweaking battery voltage reading
adcMultiplierOverride.label: ADC Multiplier Override ratio

ina219Address.description: Address of the INA219 battery monitor
ina219Address.label: INA219 Address

lightSleepDuration.description: How long the device will be in light sleep for
lightSleepDuration.label: Light Sleep Duration

minimumWakeTime.description: Minimum amount of time the device will stay awake for after receiving a packet
minimumWakeTime.label: Minimum Wake Time

noConnectionBluetoothDisabled.description: If the device does not receive a Bluetooth connection, the BLE radio will be disabled after this long
noConnectionBluetoothDisabled.label: No Connection Bluetooth Disabled

powerSavingEnabled.description: Select if powered from a low-current source (i.e. solar), to minimize power consumption as much as possible.
powerSavingEnabled.label: Включить режим энергосбережения

shutdownOnBatteryDelay.description: Automatically shutdown node after this long when on battery, 0 for indefinite
shutdownOnBatteryDelay.label: Shutdown on battery delay

superDeepSleepDuration.description: How long the device will be in super deep sleep for
superDeepSleepDuration.label: Super Deep Sleep Duration

sleepSettings.description: Sleep settings for the power module
sleepSettings.label: Sleep Settings

adminChannelEnabled.description: Allow incoming device control over the insecure legacy admin channel
adminChannelEnabled.label: Allow Legacy Admin

enableDebugLogApi.description: Output live debug logging over serial, view and export position-redacted device logs over Bluetooth
enableDebugLogApi.label: Enable Debug Log API

managed.description: If enabled, device configuration options are only able to be changed remotely by a Remote Admin node via admin messages. Do not enable this option unless at least one suitable Remote Admin node has been setup, and the public key is stored in one of the fields above.
managed.label: Managed

privateKey.description: Used to create a shared key with a remote device
privateKey.label: Приватный ключ

publicKey.description: Sent out to other nodes on the mesh to allow them to compute a shared secret key
publicKey.label: Публичный ключ

primaryAdminKey.description: The primary public key authorized to send admin messages to this node
primaryAdminKey.label: Primary Admin Key

secondaryAdminKey.description: The secondary public key authorized to send admin messages to this node
secondaryAdminKey.label: Secondary Admin Key

serialOutputEnabled.description: Serial Console over the Stream API
serialOutputEnabled.label: Serial Output Enabled

tertiaryAdminKey.description: The tertiary public key authorized to send admin messages to this node
tertiaryAdminKey.label: Tertiary Admin Key

user.title: User Settings
user.description: Configure your device name and identity settings

validation.min: Long name must be at least 1 character
validation.max: Long name must be at most 40 characters

validation.min: Short name must be at least 2 characters
validation.max: Short name must be at most 4 characters

isUnmessageable.label: Не отправляемо
isUnmessageable.description: Used to identify unmonitored or infrastructure nodes so that messaging is not available to nodes that will never respond.

isLicensed.label: Лицензированный радиолюбитель (HAM)
isLicensed.description: Enable if you are a licensed amateur radio operator, enabling this option disables encryption and is not compatible with the default Meshtastic network.
